parts.name: frame
parts.tooltip:
Frame
Frame colour.

parts.name: portrait
parts.tooltip:
Portrait
Character or item portrait filename.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
Heading text to write next to the portrait.

parts.name: detail
parts.tooltip:
Detail
Information about the portrait.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
Heading text to write.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
Body text to write.

parts.name: inner_tag
parts.tooltip:
Inner Tag
Accepts a HTML tag (e.g., b for bold, i for italics, code for monospace) for additional subheading formatting. If regular text is desired, enter 'p'.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
Writes text within a block quote.

parts.name: inner_tag
parts.tooltip:
Inner Tag
The inner tag to use.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
The text to write.

parts.name: number_of_pixels
parts.tooltip:
Number of Pixels
Only relevant for the Python version. Inserts a blank space with a given pixel height.

parts.name: bg_colour
parts.tooltip:
Background Colour
The background colour for the card.

parts.name: text_outline_colour
parts.tooltip:
Text Outline Colour
The outline colour for the text.

parts.name: card_title
parts.tooltip:
Card Title
The title of the card.

parts.name: banner_name
parts.tooltip:
Banner Name
The name of the banner.

parts.name: alignment
parts.tooltip:
Alignment
The alignment of the image.

parts.name: filename
parts.tooltip:
Filename
The name of the image file.

parts.name: max_width
parts.tooltip:
Max Width
The maximum width of the image.

parts.name: frame
parts.tooltip:
Frame
The colour of the outline around the image.

parts.name: local_filename
parts.tooltip:
Local Filename
The name of the local image file.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
The heading text to place next to the portrait.

parts.name: frame
parts.tooltip:
Frame
The colour of the outline around the image.

parts.name: filename
parts.tooltip:
Filename
The name of the portrait.

parts.name: index
parts.tooltip:
Index
The index of the subportrait in the sequence.

parts.name: end_sequence?
parts.tooltip:
End Sequence?
A 'yes'/'no' value to determine if this is the final row related to the initial 'p' or 'lp'.

parts.name: index
parts.tooltip:
Index
The index of the subportrait.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
The text to write next to the subportrait.

parts.name: custom_text
parts.tooltip:
Custom Text
Optionally changes the 'TOGGLE MINOR REWARDS' text to a custom string.

parts.name: number
parts.tooltip:
Number
A number input here will be displayed on the right side of the row. If not required, leave as a space.
To mark the row as 'important', write the letter 'i' after the number, e.g. '10i'. This will make the number a highlight colour and allow for filtering with Collection Filter.

parts.name: frame_1
parts.tooltip:
Frame 1
The frame colour of the first icon.

parts.name: filename_1
parts.tooltip:
Filename 1
The filename of the first icon.

parts.name: qty_1
parts.tooltip:
Quantity 1
The quantity of the first icon.

parts.name: frame_2
parts.tooltip:
Frame 2
The frame colour of the second icon.

parts.name: filename_2
parts.tooltip:
Filename 2
The filename of the second icon.

parts.name: qty_2
parts.tooltip:
Quantity 2
The quantity of the second icon.

parts.name: bold_text
parts.tooltip:
Bold Text
The bold text to display.

parts.name: standard_text
parts.tooltip:
Standard Text
The standard text to display.

Number
A number input here will be displayed on the right side of the row. If not required, leave as a space.
To mark the row as 'important', write the letter 'i' after the number, e.g. '10i'. This will make the number a highlight colour and allow for filtering with Collection Filter.

parts.tooltip:
Frame 1
The frame colour of the first icon.

parts.name: filename_1

The filename of the first icon.

parts.name: bold_text

Bold Text
The bold text to display.

parts.name: standard_text
parts.tooltip:
Standard Text
The standard text to display.

parts.name: number
parts.tooltip:
Number
A number input here will be displayed on the right side of the row. If not required, leave as a space.
To mark the row as 'important', write the letter 'i' after the number, e.g. '10i'. This will make the number a highlight colour and allow for filtering with Collection Filter.

parts.name: bold_text
parts.tooltip:
Bold Text
The bold text to display.

parts.name: standard_text
parts.tooltip:
Standard Text
The standard text to display.

parts.name: version
parts.tooltip:
Version
The version of the major update to take the Key Art from.

parts.name: filename
parts.tooltip:
Filename
The filename of the key art image, including file extension. Usually title.jpg.

parts.name: text
parts.tooltip:
Text
The title text to display.

parts.name: (portrait,frame)
parts.tooltip:
Portrait, Frame
Portrait filename and frame colour respectively. More tuples can be chained on after additional ||s.

parts.name: button_type
parts.tooltip:
Button Type
Type of button to insert, either "icon" or "text".

parts.name: link
parts.tooltip: URL or local path to link the button to.

parts.name: display
parts.tooltip: Text (for text button) or Material Icon (for icon button) to display inside the button.

parts.name: html_data
parts.tooltip:
HTML Data
Any valid HTML data to display.
